publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5523 Rob Gibson: Big Green Winners—That the Parliament congratulates the community group on the Isle of Eigg as one of the three winners of the Big Green Challenge, a lucrative competition created to encourage community-led carbon emission reductions; praises the Isle of Eigg team for slashing its CO2 emissions by an impressive 32% in the last year alone, making a significant impact on Scotland’s 2020 emissions reduction target of 42%; notes that the team will receive £300,000 from NESTA to continue these efforts to reduce carbon emissions, and wishes members of the team all the best in also helping other communities to learn from their experience. Supported by: Dave Thompson*

S3M-5523 Big Green Winners (lodged on 13 January 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Patrick Harvie*, Brian Adam*, Stuart McMillan*, Sandra White*, Bob Doris*, Kenneth Gibson*, Aileen Campbell*, Jackie Baillie*, Stewart Maxwell*, Nanette Milne*, Jamie McGrigor*, Bill Kidd*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Ian McKee*, Linda Fabiani*, Maureen Watt*, Joe FitzPatrick*
